Business & Economics.name: Capitalism Chronicles
Business & Economics.description: Delve into the core concepts of economics and business with this quiz. From historical figures to modern corporations, test your knowledge of the forces that shape our world.

questions.text: What is the proletariat?

What internet company goes by the acronym AOL?
Which of these is a government agency established to protect investors?
What corporation was founded by a candlemaker and a soapmaker?
